# Format of tabulated optical properties

The tabulated optical properties should be text (*.txt) files and located at ".../lib/<mat>/<ref>". For instance, ".../lib/Au/Johnson.txt". The files should be written in the following format:
```
<Description>
<Reference>
<frequency units (m, THz, eV, ...)>   <optical property (n or eps)>
f1  n1  k1
f2  n2  k2
f3  n3  k3
f4  n4  k4
...
```

For example,
```
Gold (Au), Johnson & Christy
PRB 6, 4370 (1972)
m   eps
1.879E-07	0.227056	3.04128
1.916E-07	0.295191	3.17592
1.953E-07	0.292524	3.28568
1.993E-07	0.203899	3.32766
2.033E-07	0.138171	3.39682
2.073E-07	-0.010416	3.3904
2.119E-07	-0.1325	3.51
2.164E-07	-0.233769	3.6062
2.214E-07	-0.346329	3.7102
2.262E-07	-0.4155	3.8252
2.313E-07	-0.551009	3.8922
2.371E-07	-0.616896	4.05504
2.426E-07	-0.744529	4.16328
0.000000249	-0.891261	4.33846
```
